desc: Location of the profile to use so that SOAJS can connect to the core database.
The environment the service uses and registers itself under it upon start.
Optional environment variable used to specify which IP address to use if the machine has more than one active interface.
Optional environment variable used in case a service should register itself or not.
Optional environment variable used by the DASHBOARD service ONLY. For more information checkout Deployment Section.
Mandatory variable if deploying a GCS service and contains the name of that GCS service.
Mandatory variable if deploying a GCS service and contains the version of that GCS service.
